title: power_system_start_inverter_display_not_visible
summary: Power system started. Inverter front panel is visible with indicator lights present, while the main display screen appears not showing readable output. Labels on the unit reference INV-01 power inverter, SPV-A-0001 solar panel array, and PWR-BAT-0001/0002 storage.

reference.note: Reference to the previous power system shutdown record.

external_reference.note: Raw image evidence stored on IPFS via Pinata gateway.
